extendedInfo.description: Complete and discreet Android phone tracking.Track a Target devices text messages in real-time.NO SUBSCRIPTION REQUIRED!By installing Text Watcher Full Version on a Target Android device, you can view all incoming/outgoing texts remotely.Parents now have a wonderful tool to be sure their children are always safe from bullying or other troubling situations.To use Text Watcher, install it on your own device, and follow the instructions.â¢ SMS Tracking including date, time and number.â¢ MMS Trackingâ¢ Tracking happens in real-time, and even after power off/on and reboots.â¢ Runs discretely and invisibly.â¢ Text Watcher is a Limited Company and operates its software worldwide.State of the art mobile tracking technology is now at every parents fingertips. Keep your loved ones safe at all times.

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Very discreet and useful as described. And love the fact that I don\'t have to pay for a subscription to keep it. Great job!!  :)
reviews.author: Angel Garcia

reviews.title: App sounds awesome? Question? Why does the widget show on screen?
reviews.comment: Would i need to buy the full version for mines & the targets phone? Bc when i 1st dwnload im asked to visit the site to pay for one time which sounds great! But, hw am i to get this on the targets if his screen is locked. And do i need to buy it for that phone as well?
reviews.author: Laurie Leone

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Super great app! I would highly recommend this. And tech support was incredibly helpful and responded to questions very quickly!

reviews.title: I really like this!
reviews.comment: It\'s giving me the info I need in a timely fashion, real time actually. Thanks!

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says for a one time fee when other similar apps require monthly subscriptions. The customer service is SUPERB.  They are so responsive and helpful. I got an email response within an hour, unlike other apps.

reviews.comment: This is by far the most amazing working app I\'ve got, I can\'t beleive it\'s possible for me to know another phone\'s texts ha wow!
